entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning then west 30 gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 25 April 2023
